oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Virtue, Tennessee Centennial, Nashville, 1897
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Stereograph showing the back of a statue depicting Virtue at the Tennessee Centennial Exposition. The statue is on the edge of a lily pond and stands beneath a waterfall.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lingley, B. L.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
Centennial celebrations; Sculpture; Waterfalls; Lily ponds
